  • public class ChronicDiseaseRiskAction
extends PatientBaseAction
    Used for chronicDiseaseRisks.jsp. Passes most of the logic off to ChronicDiseaseMediator, and the various subclasses of RiskChecker.
    ??:
    Andy Meneely

      • ChronicDiseaseRiskAction

        public ChronicDiseaseRiskAction(DAOFactory factory,
                        long loggedInMID,
                        java.lang.String pidString)
                         throws iTrustException,
                                DBException,
                                NoHealthRecordsException
        ??:
        factory -
        loggedInMID -
        pidString - The patient ID to be validated and used
        ??:
        iTrustException
        DBException
        NoHealthRecordsException - This is thrown if a patient is added without any health records to be checked. Try to avoid having this exception be thrown in a normal flow of events.
